attributes.action: Tighten up the law for deaths caused by punching people (one punch kills)
attributes.background: Look at the laws on how charges are brought when someone causes a death whether it be immediate or over year later by punching someone

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly how you would like the law to be tightened.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
